name: TVMediaItem.HighlightGroup
desc: A container for groups of highlights for a media item.

items.name: var localizedName: String?
items.desc: The name of a highlight group.

items.name: var highlights: [TVMediaItem.Highlight]
items.desc: An array of the individual highlights that make up a group.

items.name: class TVMediaItem.Highlight
items.desc: An object that describes a media item highlight.
